targets.expr: sum by (owner_name)(kube_job_complete{cluster=~"$cluster",condition="true",namespace="$namespace"} * on (job_name) group_left(owner_name) (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner{owner_name="$cronjob"}))) OR on() vector(0)

sum by (owner_name)
(
  kube_job_failed{cluster=~"$cluster",condition="true",namespace="$namespace"} * on (job_name)

  group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner{owner_name="$cronjob"}))
  
) OR on() vector(0)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner{owner_name="$cronjob"}))
  
) or on() vector(0)
